text:
Bollywood actor Anil Kapoor is known for playing the coolest roles. He is best at playing daddy roles beautifully, whether it was Dil Dhadakne Do or Fanney Khan.
And now once again, the man is back with yet another emotional wrenching film with Ek Ladki Ko Dekha Toh Aisa Laga. He will be seen playing daddy to his real life daughter Sonam Kapoor.
Sweetie, played by Sonam Kapoor has to deal with her over-enthusiastic family that wants to get her married, a young writer who is completely smitten by her and a secret which might not find acceptance in her family and society.
Watch the trailer. The movie is all set to release on 1st February, 2019.
title: Sonam Kapoor's Secret In The Trailer Of Ek Ladki Ko Dekha Toh Aisa Laga Is Beyond Genders
